advancements.rigoranthusemortisreborn.st: An endeavor to gain insight regarding that which has been lost sight of.
Kill a member of the Lost Species.
Obtain a record of the Lost Species.
Learn more about the Lost Species The 'Languid Dweller' by listening to a Forgotten Record.
death.attack.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ne: %1$s died from §cNecrotizing Fasciitis whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ra: %1$s has bled out from Razortooth wounds
%1$s died from Razortooth wounds whilst fighting %2$s
enchantment.rigoranthusemortisreborn.dom: Increases the player's rate of dominion regeneration.
Increases the player's maximum dominion capacity.
enchantment.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ref: Gain a random chance to reflexively summon a sundered cadaver while being attacked, which will aid you in combat.
gamerule.does_dweller_spawn.description: Turns on or off ability for languid dweller to spawn
gamerule.allow_canis_spawn.description: True/On = Canis Chordata allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allowCanisSpawn.description: True/On = Canis Chordata allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allowDwellerSpawn.description: True/On = Languid Dweller allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allow_dweller_spawn.description: Turns on or off ability for languid dweller to spawn
gamerule.allow_necraw_spawn.description: True/On = Languid Dweller allowed to spawn.
gamerule.allowNecrawSpawn.description: True/On = Necraw Fascii allowed to spawn.
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.forgotten_: A crumbling record. Perhaps it contains knowledge of things long since forgotten.
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.music_disk: Ever wanted to start a night club?
item.rigoranthusemortisreborn.item_linke: Lol this ain't asposed to exist
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.augment: Right-click in the air to change mode
Redstone Control mode: will NOT smelt when supplied with a redstone signal
Redstone Inverse Control mode: will ONLY smelt when supplied with a redstone signal
Comparator mode: An internal comparator, outputs signal to all sides
Comparator Subtraction mode: same as Comparator mode but signal subtraction strength is configurable in the smeltery GUI
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.soul_co: §c§oBurns with the cries of lost souls.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.crushin: durability, and are used to crush
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.dweller: their thoracic cage in good condition.
You can also craft one with
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.esoteri: A powerful resource coveted by the Languid Dweller.
Partially reponsible for the degredation of the species
§kA resource coveted by the Languid Dweller
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.recondi: §kA resource coveted by the Languid Dweller
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.a: Strengthen Obsidian Futher by Smelting it.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.f: Sandesite that has been strengthened by melting the Zinc/Iron within it to create an amalgam.
Smelt it to get stone, or combine
with clay to get an Unfired Brick
Smelt it to get Netherrack, or Combine with clay to get an Unfired Nether Brick
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.g: Is there a way to get my gold back from this? No?
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.h: Gives salt a purpose as a decorative/building block
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.s: §c§oBurns with the cries of lost souls.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.o: Turn Magma into a Fancy Lamp
A Stronger, Slip-Proof Version of Ice
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.s: This berry is a favorite treat among Cani, and is safe for human consumption
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.c: A rare drop from §6Sundered Cadavers§f. Wards mobs away from Ichor Extraction Processes.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.d: A gruesome repository of old-world knowledge
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.h: Wards mobs away from Ichor Extraction Processes.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.p: Harvest it to obtain a §6Psyglyphic Script§f.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.i: Collects certain items from hoppers, adjacent chests,
or nearby §6Splintered Pedestals§f and extracts the §6Ichor§f
from them. Any extracted Ichor will be converted to Dominion
and drained into the §6Dominion Jar§f placed below it.
This mechanism accepts items such as:
§6The Ichor extraction process attracts the undead, so be careful...
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.d: Produces a steady supply of §6Dominion Gems§f
by collecting & crystallizing Dominion over time.
Place above a §6Dominion Jar§f for the Crystallizer to draw from.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.p: Place above an §6Emortic Cortex§f & surround with §6Splintered Pedestals§f,
atop which you can place ingredients for amalgamator recipes.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.e: An esoteric mechanism for propogating the faculties of
encephali obtained from members of §6'The Lost Species'§f,
the progenitors to the art of enchantments.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.c: The creation of §6Ghast Iron Ingots§f & a number of other items
require a special mechanism designed to condense &
Some Crafting recipes may require a §6Dominion Jar§f to be
right-click the block with the first ingredient in hand
then do the same with the second ingredient. If enough
Dominion is nearby, the crafting process will
begin automatically. §6You may automate crafts with§f
§6hoppers.§f A hopper from any side will place the
first ingredient, while a hopper from the top will
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.e: Enables the transport of §6Dominion§f between §6Dominion Jars§f
-To pull Dominion from jars, use the §6Dominion Wand
on the jar, then on the relay.
-To send between relays or from a relay to a jar, use the wand on the
relay, then the target you wish to send Dominion to.
Relays may only reach up to 30 blocks away.
To clear connections, sneak while using the §6Dominion Wand§f on the relay.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.r: Operates similar to the §6Dominion Relay§f, but supports
§9taking from§f and §9transferring to§f §bmultiple jars at once§f.
-The splitter has a much larger through-put than the
Dominion Relay, and will split this throughput
See the instructions on the §6Dominion Relay§f for use.
Operates similar to the §6Dominion Relay§f, but will
deposit to jars it is not linked to, within 5 blocks
See the instructions on the §6Dominion Relay§f for use.
tooltip.pact.rigoranthusemortisreborn.se: If one wishes to become a Master themself, they must
first prove that they posess the Qualities of a Master.
A pact offered to a Master, Stamped with
the blood of their Servants should suffice
tooltip.pact.rigoranthusemortisreborn.my: If one has already proven that they posess the
Qualities of a Master, it is said that the Pact of
Myrmidon may increase the power of ones retainers
However, doing so may also come at a price...
tooltip.pact.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ro: The Canis are known to be Masters of Sundered
Cadavers. A Rogue Pact of Myrmidon has
slightly modified conditions than its counterpart,
as it allows a closer bond between the Canis the Undead
whom swore servitude to it. Once established
tooltip.pact.rigoranthusemortisreborn.pu: This Pact signifies the greatest trust between Master
and Servant, as it allows the Servant to fully
call upon the full strengeth of its own Underlings.
Once established, this pact cannot be severed.
treat.homini_treat.low_level: Ваша клык не может справиться с удивительной силой, содержащейся в этих лакомствах.
treat.homini_treat.too_young: Ваша клык недостаточно опытна, чтобы овладеть всей силой этой пряности.
treat.homini_treat.max_level: ПОЗДРАВЛЯЕМ! Ваша клык достигла максимального уровня!
treat.normal_treat.too_young: Эта клык ещё слишком молода для приобретения навыков.
treat.normal_treat.max_level: Ваша клык имеет слишком высокий уровень, чтобы получать опыт от этих пряностей.
treat.chordata_treat.max_level: Ваша клык имеет слишком высокий уровень, чтобы получать опыт от этих пряностей.
treat.big_bone.too_young: Эта клык слишком молода для этой кости.
treat.tiny_bone.too_young: Эта клык слишком молода для этой кости.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.brawler.d: Увеличивает критический урон собаки на 1/2 сердца за уровень, при полном освоении бонус - 1 сердце.
Увеличивает шанс того, что клык полностью заблокирует физическую атаку.
Каждый уровень повышает вероятность того, что с жертвы Вашей собаки выпадет в два раза больше предметов. 10%% за каждый уровень, при полном освоении бонус - 60%%.
Позволяет Вашей клык поджигать свою жертву. При повышении увеличивает длительность горения. Полное освоение наделят собаку иммунитетом к огню.
Позволяет Вам стать наезником Вашей собаки. При повышении увеличиват высоту прыжка. Чтобы оседлать собаку, подпрыгните и нажмите ПКМ (с пустыми руками).
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.wayward_t: При повышении открывает 3 дополнительных слота в инвентаре собаки. Чтобы открыть этот инвентарь, нажмите ПКМ по Вашей клык, имея в руке доски! При полном освоении клык будет автоматически поднимать лежащие на земле предметы.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.calloused: При повышении увеличивает высоту падения без получения урона. При полном освоении Ваша клык приобретет полную неуязвимость к падению, а так же возможность планировать при падении!
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.rapid_rec: Увеличивает количество здоровья, которое будет восстанавливать Ваша клык без отдыха. При полном освоении она будет лечиться на 50%% быстрее (сидя).
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.powderkeg: клык с этим навыком будет чуять криперов на расстоянии и предупреждать вас об этом рычанием. За каждый уровень это расстояние увеличивается на 6 блоков. При полном освоении Ваша клык получит возможность атаковать криперов, а при атаке таймер детонации крипера будет сбрасываться.
Увеличивает скорость Вашей собаки при преследовании цели или езде. За каждый уровень - увеличение скорости +12%%, при полном освоении бонус - 15%%.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.oceanic_r: Когда Ваша клык заходит в воду, есть шанс, что она поймает рыбу. Вы получите эту рыбу когда клык вылезет и отряхнётся. Шанс вылавливания повышается с уровнем, если у собаки есть способность "Адская гончая", появляется шанс, что рыба уже будет жареной (зависит от уровня навыка). При полном освоении Ваша клык сможет дышать под водой.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.chungus_p: Увеличивает NP, которые Ваша клык получает с едой на 10%% за уровень. На уровне навыка 3 она сможет есть гнилую плоть, а на 5 уровне - рыбу.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.undertake: Наносит 1 единицу урона всем ближайшим нежити. При повышении навыка увеличивается дальность действия, а при полном освоении урон возрастает в 2 раза.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.perniciou: Атаки этой собаки будут отравлять врагов. Длительность эффекта отравления увеличивается с уровнем навыка. На 3 уровне навыка Ваша клык приобретёт иммунитет к яду, а полное освоение поможет Вам полностью отчиститься от эффектов зелий, включая отравление (ПКМ по клык, с паучьим глазом в руке. Стоимость - 30 NP).
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.savior.de: Если Ваше здоровье на критическом уровне, клык будет предпринимать попытки вылечить Вас (1/2 сердца за уровень. Стоимость - 100 NP). При полном освоении стоимость лечения уменьшается (до 80 NP).
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.snarl.des: Возьми кость в руку и высвободи внутренний рык своей собаки! Длительность эффектов оглушения и урона за рык увеличится, а время восстановления этой способности уменьшится за каждый уровень. При полном освоении отдых составит 40 тактов (2 секунды), а длительность эффекта - 70 тактов (3.5 секунд).
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.piercing_: Этот навык поможет Вашей клык завоевать сердце любого жителя. Также есть шанс получения подарка. При повышении Вы получите более дорогие подарки. Этот навык может быть использован только раз в 2 дня (игровое время). При полном освоении навык может быть использован 1 раз в день.
Set your Whistle to the Summon Undead command. Upon activation, any Summoner Cani in docile mode will summon some Cadavers to aid you in your endeavors. Summoned Cadavers are friendly to you & will dissapear after a few minutes. The cost is reduced with higher levels in the skill
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.neptunes_: Даёт возможность кататься на клык в воде и дольше дышать под водой. Полное освоение позволит наезднику лучше видеть под водой.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.snarl.lev: Положите несколько очков в ревущую бурю, чтобы использовать!
canis.mode.wandering.description: В этом режиме Ваша клык стоит возле миски с едой и ожидает следующей команды. Чтобы закрепить за собакой миску, просто приведите собаку к ней (на расстояние 1 блока).
canis.mode.tactical.description: В этом режиме Ваша клык будет следовать за Вами, но никого не будет атаковать.
canis.mode.aggressive.description: В этом режиме Ваша клык будет следовать за Вами и атаковать мобов, которых Вы атакуете, или которые атакуют Вас.
canis.mode.berserker.description: В этом режиме Ваша клык будет следовать за Вами и атаковать всех мобов без предупреждения.
canis.mode.docile.description: В этом режиме Ваша клык будет следовать за Вами, но игнорировать всех мобов. Так же, в этом режиме, Ваша клык ждет, когда Вы бросите ей косточку.
canis.mode.patrol.description: В этом режиме ваша клык будет патрулировать между 2-4 точками (использую командную эмблему) и атакуя монстров.
canis.gender.female.subject: она
canis.gender.female.title: девочка
canis.gender.male.subject: он
canis.gender.male.title: мальчик
canis.gender.unisex.subject: they
canis.gender.unisex.title: unisex
modgui.config.canissettings.tooltip: Здесь можно изменить детали поведения собак
The Knowledge hidden within this cipher has not yet been extracted
The Knowledge once contained within this cipher has already been taken. You cannot use this Cipher to obtain a Psyglyphic Script
rigoranthusemortisreborn.canis.successfu: §6The Pact was Successful. §cThe Beasts Impurities will now be Expelled.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.ring_of: In addition to providing a small bonus to maximum dominion and dominion regen, Rings of Conservation reduce the total cost to cast a spell.
Conserves slightly more dominion than the Ring of Lesser Conservation.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.amulet_: Increases your max dominion capacity by a moderate amount.
Increases dominion regeneration rate by a moderate amount.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.lost_to: Casts a spell at half the cost or the users entire dominion bar, whichever is smaller.
tooltip.dominion_gem: Created by condensing Ichor using an §6Emortic Crafting Press§f.
alert.core: An Emortic Cortex must be below this block.
alert.ichor_jar: A Jar of Ichor must be below this block.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.ritual_desc.bin: The Ritual of Binding converts nearby eligible entities into Bound Scripts, used for summoning a Familiar. For more information, see the section on Familiars.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.ritual_desc.res: Heals nearby entities or harms undead over time. This ritual requires source to operate.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page.adonis: A bow that is lacking in neither strength nor beauty. If the player has enough dominion, arrows will gain bonuses and may apply effects to their target.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.bow.invalid: Bows may only accept spells that do not contain a form.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.color_gui.title: Spell Color
rigoranthusemortisreborn.spell_arrow.des: Augments spells when used with the bow: The Adonis.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.dominion_crysta: There is not enough Dominion nearby.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.emortic_craftin: There is not enough Dominion nearby.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.ritual.need_dom: Dominion is needed to complete the Ritual
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.exp_gem: Sneak to use the entire stack.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.tooltip.delphic: Grown from seeds crafted using the Psyglyphic Amalgamator.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page.lusteric_s: Blocking attacks grants the user a short period of Dominion Regen. & Spell Damage. Additionally, this shield repairs itself utilizing the owners Dominion.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.tooltip.can_ins: Can be inscribed with a spell at a Table.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.offerin: An Offering used for rituals. Consumed on use.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.enchanting.bad_: This item must have the previous level of enchantment.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.enchanting.inco: This enchantment is incompatible with this item.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.summone: Increases the duration and power of your summons.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.armor: Provide additional dominion and bonus dominion regen. Each piece of armor will provide a bonus, and each tier provides a greater bonus than the previous.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.books: Books may be dyed by crafting them with a piece of dye.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.ritual_ve: A vessel that may be used as decoration or for performing rituals. Applying a redstone signal will disable a running ritual.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.recondite: Recondite Ore: §kA resource coveted by the Languid Dweller.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.lissome_l: A decorative block that can be placed on any liquid or block. The texture of this block varies depending on its environment.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.dominion_: A Dominion Berry Bush can be found in Taiga and Forest biomes, and produces Dominion Berries. A Dominion Berry can be used to craft a Potion of Dominion Regeneration or consumed as food. Dominion Berry foods will also grant Dominion Regeneration.

Dominion Jars store dominion gathered from nearby extractors. Dominion is used in recipes and rituals by powering devices like the Emortic Crafting Press and Psyglyphic Amalgamator. Dominion may be moved using a bucket, or the jar can be picked up and moved. To use Dominion in a jar, simply place the jar near your desired device. Dominion Jars will provide a signal to Redstone Comparators based on their fill level.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.summoners: Grants your summons additional duration, strength, speed, and deals damage to enemies that harm them.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.familiar.cooldo: You must wait before summoning another familiar.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.category.famili: Familiars can provide passive buffs and assistance in combat. For more information, see the section on Summoning a Familiar.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page2.summoning: To begin summoning familiars, you will need to obtain a Bound Script of the entity you wish to befriend. These can be obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a relevant entity. See the full list of eligible entities in the Familiars section. Once you have obtained a Bound Script, use it to learn the familiar.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page3.summoning: Once you have obtained a bound script, you may access your list of familiars from your Spellbook crafting menu in the Familiars section. Selecting a Familiar will summon it in the world and give you Familiar Sickness, preventing you from summoning another one for a short time. To obtain your first familiar, perform the Ritual of Binding near a Carbuncle. Familiars are bound to the player and cannot be transferred between books.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page4.summoning: Typically only one familiar may be out at a time, and summoning another familiar will remove others bound to you. You may dismiss your own familiar by casting Dispel on it. In exchange for empowering the owner, familiars will reserve a portion of max dominion from their owner for as long as they persist in the world.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.familiar.script: Used for obtaining familiars. Obtained from the Ritual of Binding.
rigoranthusemortisreborn.page1.verdurous: The Verdurous Woodlands is a somewhat rare biome filled with Jessic and Azuloreal Trees, as well as Spectabilis Bushes and an increased amount and Recondite ore.
block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.canis_bed: Shift-click with your Canis nearby and they will come and make the bed their own. If your Canis Perishes, right-click their bed to revive them.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.homebound: While a Canis with this skill is on your head, your bed will be highlighted in a black outline. To get the Canis on you head, right click on them with a bone in hand. The range at which it can do this is equal to 200 blocks per level, but becomes infinite at level 5.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.iridescen: Allows your Canis put torch when light level is down, at the cost of one torch from it's inventory. To give it torches you can drop some nearby and it will pick it up. At level 5 Cani don't need torches in their inventory anymore.
skill.rigoranthusemortisreborn.piercing_: Jesus christ waht the fuck is that thing?!
canis.mode.guard.description: Your Canis will follow closely and attack any monsters that come too close.
entity.rigoranthusemortisreborn.canis.be: If Shears are used with a ''Pact Of Servitude'' in your off-hand, your Canis will be untamed
argument.rigoranthusemortisreborn.uuid.f: %s is of the wrong format. Should contain 4 dashes
argument.rigoranthusemortisreborn.uuid.s: %s contains one or more invalid characters
commands.canisrevive.uuid.failure: Failed to raise %s from the dead
command.canisrevive.imprecise: Too many Cani (%d) for this master under this name, use `byuuid` for %s
canisbed.explain.missing: This item has likely needs to be spawned in directly!
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.tooth.u: While handling the tooth, you feel a sharp sting and drop it.
tooltip.rigoranthusemortisreborn.tooth.s: While handling the tooth, you accidentally cut yourself and drop it.
tooltip.block.rigoranthusemortisreborn.f: with clay to get an Unfired Nether Brick
